mStory: The Apocalypse is upon us. The Seven Seals of Hell have been opened and the Gates of Hell have unleashed all kinds of demons into the world. Save us, Oh! Mighty Hero by going into the depths of hell and fighting the worst of the worst to seal the gates again and stop the apocalypse.

Underworld.mStory: The beginning and the end of the labyrinth of hell

Underworld_Hell's Gates.mStory: The start and the stop of the apocalypse

mTreasures: Atrium of Death_Aura of Death_PALE RING
Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's White Room_WHITE RING
Belly of Gluttony_Belly of Leviathan_PINK RING
Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy_GOLD RING
Abyss Of War_Red Horseman Room_RED RING
mTreasureCollector.mStory: Apocalypse is upon us as the seals are broken and the gate is open
mTreasureCollector.mUpdateStory: The devil is angry and is going to stop you from stopping the apocalypse
mTreasureCollector.mEndStory: You have successfully sealed the gates of hell and stopped the apocalypse

Underworld_Hell's Gates_LUCIFER MORNINGS.mBlockStory: The shield protects you from the devil's stare
Underworld_Hell's Gates_LUCIFER MORNINGS.mStory: The devil himself, guarding the gates of hell
Underworld_Hell's Gates_LUCIFER MORNINGS.mConditionalObject: Atrium of Death_Aura of Death_DEATH SCYTHE
Underworld_Hell's Gates_LUCIFER MORNINGS.mUpdateStory: Stares deep into your soul, killing your strength from within
Underworld_Hell's Gates_LUCIFER MORNINGS.mEndStory: The devil frowns and returns to the depths of hell planning and plotting his next return

ABYSS OF WAR PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Abyss Of War and Underworld

MATRIX OF GREED PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Matrix of Greed and Underworld

BELLY OF GLUTTONY PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Belly of Gluttony and Underworld

ATRIUM OF DEATH PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Atrium of Death and Underworld

Abyss Of War.mStory: War has ruled and will rule forever

Abyss Of War_War Memorial.mStory: All the trinkets that war has collected over the years

Abyss Of War_War Memorial_SHIELD OF INVI.mStory: An unbreakable protection from almost all hellish attacks

Abyss Of War_War Memorial_DAMNED SWORD.mStory: The sword of Ares, a demon killing machine

ABYSS OF WAR PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Abyss Of War and Underworld

Abyss Of War_Lair of Fire.mStory: Here lives the demon of hell fire

Abyss Of War_Lair of Fire_HELLFIRE DEMON.mBlockStory: The shield protects you from the effects of hell fire
Abyss Of War_Lair of Fire_HELLFIRE DEMON.mStory: Came from the deepest underworld to burn souls
Abyss Of War_Lair of Fire_HELLFIRE DEMON.mUpdateStory: Tries to burn your soul with hell fire
Abyss Of War_Lair of Fire_HELLFIRE DEMON.mEndStory: Its head comes off and it sheds its skin

Abyss Of War_DEPTHS OF TARTARUS.mStory: Feels like going deeper into hell

Abyss Of War_Tartarus.mStory: Demons of hell have risen to party

Abyss Of War_Tartarus_SWARM OF DEMONS.mStory: Looks like all the demons are partying into the Apocalypse
Abyss Of War_Tartarus_SWARM OF DEMONS.mConditionalObject: Abyss Of War_Lair of Fire_FIRE DEMON SKIN
Abyss Of War_Tartarus_SWARM OF DEMONS.mUpdateStory: You are not a demon, they surround you from all directions and try to kill you
Abyss Of War_Tartarus_SWARM OF DEMONS.mEndStory: Your fire demon disguise fools these dumb demons and they get back to partying unaware of their impending doom

Abyss Of War_DEPTHS OF TARTARUS.mStory: Feels like going deeper into hell

Abyss Of War_WORLD DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who dare may walk this path

Abyss Of War_NUCLEAR DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who wish to see radioactivity may go this way

Abyss Of War_PATH TO WAR.mStory: Only the daring can challenge war

Abyss Of War_Nuclear War Room_NUCLEAR WA.mStory: Radioactivity everywhere, not a single live soul

Abyss Of War_NUCLEAR DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who wish to see radioactivity may go this way

Abyss Of War_World War Room_WORLD WAR II.mStory: The Nazis are back and the Allies can't defeat them all
Abyss Of War_World War Room_WORLD WAR II.mUpdateStory: More than a 1000 zombie nazis attack you from all directions

Abyss Of War_WORLD DEATH PASSAGE.mStory: Those who dare may walk this path

Abyss Of War_Red Horseman Room_RED HORSE.mBlockStory: The shield teleports you back to war's realm
Abyss Of War_Red Horseman Room_RED HORSE.mStory: War, Loves to battle for supremacy
Abyss Of War_Red Horseman Room_RED HORSE.mUpdateStory: Tries to blast you into oblivion
Abyss Of War_Red Horseman Room_RED HORSE.mEndStory: Climbs the red horse and gallops back to where it came from, leaving behind something extremely valuable

Abyss Of War_Red Horseman Room_RED RING.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of War

ABYSS OF WAR PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Abyss Of War and Underworld

Abyss Of War_PATH TO WAR.mStory: Only the daring can challenge war

Matrix of Greed.mStory: If you are tempted by greed, you are not fit to be in this region

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_OPER.mStory: Provides entry into the Matrix of Greed
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_OPER.mConditionalObject: Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_GOLD COIN
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_OPER.mUpdateStory: Needs something in order to give you passage
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_OPER.mEndStory: The operator accepts the gold coin as a valid offering and opens doorways

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_MONE.mStory: Lots of winnings would make you rich
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_MONE.mUpdateStory: Play me to get more money than god
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_MONE.mEndStory: You are a greedy human being and you get nothing

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_POWE.mStory: Lots of winnings would make you a tyrant
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_POWE.mUpdateStory: Play me to rule the world
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_POWE.mEndStory: You are a greedy human being and you get nothing

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_POOR.mStory: You may win a lot you may lose a lot
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_POOR.mUpdateStory: Play me to test your luck
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_POOR.mEndStory: The slot machine throws out a gold coin

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_GOLD.mStory: Lots of winnings would give you gold
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_GOLD.mUpdateStory: Play me to be a gold master
Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_GOLD.mEndStory: You are a greedy human being and you get nothing

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_GOLD.mStory: Shiny object that can get you places

Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_MIDA.mStory: Made of gold, only thing powerful to break the temptation of greed

MATRIX OF GREED PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Matrix of Greed and Underworld

Matrix of Greed_The Mirror Room_MIRROR O.mBlockStory: The shield protects you from the mirror's voodoo
Matrix of Greed_The Mirror Room_MIRROR O.mStory: The most powerful demon of greed and desire
Matrix of Greed_The Mirror Room_MIRROR O.mConditionalObject: Matrix of Greed_The Ultimate Casino_MIDAS HAMMER
Matrix of Greed_The Mirror Room_MIRROR O.mUpdateStory: Tries to ensnare you with visions of great achievements and desires
Matrix of Greed_The Mirror Room_MIRROR O.mEndStory: The mirror breaks into millions of pieces unlocking doorways

Matrix of Greed_THE GOLDEN PATH.mRoom1: Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy

Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy.mBlockStory: The shield blocks his attempted entrapment
Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy.mStory: The ruler of the matrix of greed and all powerful gold master
Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy.mUpdateStory: Tries to turn you into one of his prized gold trophies
Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy.mEndStory: Pretty disappointed, Midas runs away like the coward he is, leaving behind his prized possession

Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of Greed

MATRIX OF GREED PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Matrix of Greed and Underworld

Matrix of Greed_THE GOLDEN PATH.mRoom1: Matrix of Greed_Room of Midas The Greedy

Belly of Gluttony.mStory: The hunger of doing nothing but eating drags the soul of the damned here

Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room.mStory: The demons of hell feast of the flesh of all the souls in hell here

Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room_FEAST TABLE.mStory: The demons have their glutonous feast of human flesh on this table
Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room_FEAST TABLE.mUpdateStory: Feels as if something is pushing to get out from beneath the table
Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room_FEAST TABLE.mEndStory: Moving the table revealed a special artifact that might be useful

Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room_DELICIOUS M.mStory: Eating this would never fullfill your desire, or will it?
Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room_DELICIOUS M.mEndStory: You feel full and bloated but you now have a desire to eat everything

Belly of Gluttony_Feast Room_BLOB MELTOR.mStory: The only weapon capable of melting the pig blob demon.

BELLY OF GLUTTONY PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Belly of Gluttony and Underworld

Belly of Gluttony_TO THE BLOB.mStory: The path seems to be covered with nothing but vomit and slime

Belly of Gluttony_Pig Lair_PIG BLOB.mBlockStory: The shield pushes the demon aside
Belly of Gluttony_Pig Lair_PIG BLOB.mUpdateStory: Tries to swallow you as a whole
Belly of Gluttony_Pig Lair_PIG BLOB.mEndStory: The demon melts until there is nothing but slime left

Belly of Gluttony_Pig Lair_ELIXIR OF THI.mStory: Quenches any kind of thirst or bloodlust

Belly of Gluttony_TO THE BLOB.mStory: The path seems to be covered with nothing but vomit and slime

Belly of Gluttony_PATHWAY TO PURGATORY.mStory: Try to beat the monster from the deepest depths of hell

Belly of Gluttony_Belly of Leviathan_LEV.mBlockStory: The shield blocks the Leviathan's venomous teeth
Belly of Gluttony_Belly of Leviathan_LEV.mStory: The infamous demon banished to the depths of Purgatory
Belly of Gluttony_Belly of Leviathan_LEV.mUpdateStory: Tries to bite into your skin with its razor sharp teeth
Belly of Gluttony_Belly of Leviathan_LEV.mEndStory: It Crawl backs into Purgatory, dissapointed and sad, leaving behind something very valuable

Belly of Gluttony_Belly of Leviathan_PIN.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of Gluttony

BELLY OF GLUTTONY PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Belly of Gluttony and Underworld

Belly of Gluttony_PATHWAY TO PURGATORY.mStory: Try to beat the monster from the deepest depths of hell

Realm of Famine_Tar Room_BLACK HORSEMAN.mStory: The embodiment of famine, ruling earth through draught and famine
Realm of Famine_Tar Room_BLACK HORSEMAN.mUpdateStory: Tries to suck all nutrition and electrolytes out of your body
Realm of Famine_Tar Room_BLACK HORSEMAN.mEndStory: She rides away on her horse, cursing you to a lifetime of disappointment but leaving an important piece behind

Realm of Famine_Gates of Starvation_STAR.mUpdateStory: Can't open the gateway without quenching our thirst
Realm of Famine_Gates of Starvation_STAR.mEndStory: Elixir quenched their thirst and they opened the gateway

Manacles of Pestilence.mStory: The only way out is in a hospital stretcher

Manacles of Pestilence_Room of Protectio.mStory: A sheltor from the upcoming plague
Bring back from the dead or send back to death
The only proper protection from the cruelty of pestilence

MANACLES OF PESTILENCE PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Manacles of Pestilence and Underworld

Manacles of Pestilence_FUMING PATH.mStory: Fumes of pungent chemicals are creeping out

Manacles of Pestilence_Chemical Testing.mStory: The deadliest weapons of mass destructions are tested here
This chemical testing facility can kill almost anyone
Manacles of Pestilence_Chemical Testing.mConditionalObject: Manacles of Pestilence_Room of Protection_BEAK MASK
Manacles of Pestilence_Chemical Testing.mUpdateStory: The strong chemicals creep up on you
Manacles of Pestilence_Chemical Testing.mEndStory: The beak mask protects you from the effects of the chemicals

Manacles of Pestilence_FUMING PATH.mStory: Fumes of pungent chemicals are creeping out

Manacles of Pestilence_DISEASE ROUTE.mStory: Only take this route if you have a good immune system

Manacles of Pestilence_ANSWER ROUTE.mStory: If you have a good IQ you may pass

Manacles of Pestilence_Riddle Room.mStory: Are you a know it all? Try to get out of this riddle

Manacles of Pestilence_Riddle Room_THE B.mStory: Sit down gather round and listen to my tale. Of A Time when humanity would fail. To conquer death like it always had. We have died before but this time was bad. In threes they came spreading like plague. We know many died but the numbers are vague
Manacles of Pestilence_Riddle Room_THE B.mEndStory: The black death was pestilence's masterpiece

Manacles of Pestilence_IQ TO PESTILENCE.mStory: You have defeated pestilence in theory now time to defeat her in reality

Manacles of Pestilence_ANSWER ROUTE.mStory: If you have a good IQ you may pass

Manacles of Pestilence_Disease Room_PLAG.mBlockStory: The shield redirects the acid somewhere else
Manacles of Pestilence_Disease Room_PLAG.mStory: Pestilence's prized pupil, responsible for the bubonic plague
Manacles of Pestilence_Disease Room_PLAG.mConditionalObject: Manacles of Pestilence_Room of Protection_PECULIAR MEDICINAL INJECTION
Manacles of Pestilence_Disease Room_PLAG.mUpdateStory: Throws disease carrying acid towards you
Manacles of Pestilence_Disease Room_PLAG.mEndStory: The injection reacts with the demon making him burst into tiny pieces

Manacles of Pestilence_DISEASE ROUTE.mStory: Only take this route if you have a good immune system

Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's Whit.mStory: The house of horrors of pestilence

Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's Whit.mBlockStory: The shield renders her attacks useless
Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's Whit.mStory: Pestilence herself, shocked that you passed her henchmen
Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's Whit.mUpdateStory: Sends all her powers of pollution and disease to crumble you
Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's Whit.mEndStory: She mumbles some curse words as she rides off on her horse, leaving behind her prized possession

Manacles of Pestilence_Pestilence's Whit.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of Pestilence

MANACLES OF PESTILENCE PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Manacles of Pestilence and Underworld

Manacles of Pestilence_IQ TO PESTILENCE.mStory: You have defeated pestilence in theory now time to defeat her in reality

Brothel of Lust.mStory: Whether it is lust of the flesh or of power, you would give in to your temptations here

Brothel of Lust_Desire Room.mStory: Fullfill your every desire by picking your lust

Brothel of Lust_Desire Room_WHAT DO YOU.mStory: Play to unlock doors to your lust and temptation
Brothel of Lust_Desire Room_WHAT DO YOU.mEndStory: Chose your door carefully as your path depends on your lust

BROTHEL OF LUST PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Brothel of Lust and Underworld

Brothel of Lust_Room of Power_DEMON OF P.mStory: Threatened by you, will attack you
Brothel of Lust_Room of Power_DEMON OF P.mConditionalObject: Brothel of Lust_Desire Room_WAND OF POWER
Brothel of Lust_Room of Power_DEMON OF P.mUpdateStory: Sees your wand and attacks you with all its power
Brothel of Lust_Room of Power_DEMON OF P.mEndStory: You didn't give in to your lust. Demon lets you pass

Brothel of Lust_Room of Money_DEMON OF M.mStory: Can't stand the sight of you, will attack you
Brothel of Lust_Room of Money_DEMON OF M.mConditionalObject: Brothel of Lust_Desire Room_KEY TO BANK
Brothel of Lust_Room of Money_DEMON OF M.mEndStory: You didn't give in to your lust. Demon lets you pass

Brothel of Lust_Room of Love_DEMON OF LO.mStory: Hates your guts, will attack you
Brothel of Lust_Room of Love_DEMON OF LO.mConditionalObject: Brothel of Lust_Desire Room_CLOAK OF LOVE
Brothel of Lust_Room of Love_DEMON OF LO.mUpdateStory: Tries to seduce you into submission
Brothel of Lust_Room of Love_DEMON OF LO.mEndStory: You didn't give in to your lust. Demon lets you pass

Brothel of Lust_Room of Dreams_DEMON OF.mStory: You feel a sudden drowsy feeling
Brothel of Lust_Room of Dreams_DEMON OF.mConditionalObject: Brothel of Lust_Desire Room_CAP OF DREAMS
Brothel of Lust_Room of Dreams_DEMON OF.mUpdateStory: You fall into a hypnotism of continuous never ending nightmares
Brothel of Lust_Room of Dreams_DEMON OF.mEndStory: You didn't give in to your lust. Demon lets you pass

Brothel of Lust_The Brothel_SUCCUBUS.mBlockStory: The shield makes you immune to her charms
Brothel of Lust_The Brothel_SUCCUBUS.mUpdateStory: Tries to control you with her lusty flesh and mesmerizing eyes
Brothel of Lust_The Brothel_SUCCUBUS.mEndStory: She grows tentacles and creeps into the depths of where she came from leaving behind a valuable item

Brothel of Lust_The Brothel_PURPLE RING.mStory: The All Powerful Ring of Lust

BROTHEL OF LUST PORTAL.mStory: Portal between Brothel of Lust and Underworld

Atrium of Death.mStory: The Only Zone of Hell the devil also fears
Atrium of Death.mEntryRoom: Atrium of Death_Land of the Living

Atrium of Death_Land of the Living.mStory: Only the living shall reside here

Atrium of Death_Land of the Living_THE C.mStory: Made with the flesh of all the reaped souls
Atrium of Death_Land of the Living_THE C.mUpdateStory: Something below is disshaping the carpet

Atrium of Death_Land of the Living_PROTO.mStory: Only weapon strong enough to take down ghosts

Atrium of Death_Land of the Living_CLOAK.mStory: Brings light to the darkest of places

Atrium of Death_Maze of Undead 9.mStory: Both eerieness and impending doom creep up on you

Atrium of Death_Maze of Undead 10_GHOST.mBlockStory: The shield creates an impenetrable force field around you

Atrium of Death_Maze of Undead Exit_FERR.mStory: Ferry's the dead souls... Could be bribed to take the living

Atrium of Death_FERRY TO DEATH.mRoom1: Atrium of Death_Maze of Undead Exit

Atrium of Death_Aura of Death.mStory: No living being can survive in this realm

Atrium of Death_Aura of Death_PALE HORSE.mBlockStory: The shield blocks the scythe with tremendous effort
Atrium of Death_Aura of Death_PALE HORSE.mStory: Embodiment of Death, the grim reaper, feared by the devil as well
Atrium of Death_Aura of Death_PALE HORSE.mUpdateStory: Tries to slice you with the death scythe
